Package src.pkg_rooms

Class TransporterRoom

java.lang.Object
src.pkg_rooms.Room
src.pkg_rooms.TransporterRoom
public class TransporterRoom extends Room
This class represents a special type of room in the game, known as a transporter room. A transporter room can randomly teleport the player to another room in the game. It extends the basic functionality of a Room and adds teleportation capabilities.
Author:
Pierre MATAR

  • Constructor Details

    • TransporterRoom

      public TransporterRoom(String pName, String pDescription, String pImage, boolean pIsTransporterRoom, GameEngine pGameEngine)
      Constructor to initialize a transporter room with specific properties.
      Parameters:
      pName - The name of the room.
      pDescription - A description of the room.
      pImage - The image representing the room.
      pIsTransporterRoom - A flag indicating if the room is a transporter room.
      pGameEngine - The game engine for managing room and game state.

    • TransporterRoom

      public TransporterRoom(String pName, String pDescription, String pImage)
      Constructor to initialize a transporter room without specifying transporter functionality. This constructor defaults the transporter room flag to false and passes null for the game engine.
      Parameters:
      pName - The name of the room.
      pDescription - A description of the room.
      pImage - The image representing the room.

  • Method Details

    • isATransporterRoom

      public boolean isATransporterRoom()
      Returns:
      True if the room is a transporter room, false otherwise.

    • getExit

      public Room getExit(String pDirection)
      Returns the exit in the specified direction. If the direction is valid, it calls the parent method to retrieve the exit. Otherwise, it teleports the player to a random room.
      Overrides:
      getExit in class Room
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction of the exit.
      Returns:
      The room that the player can enter after moving in the specified direction or a random room.

    • findRandomRoom

      private Room findRandomRoom()
      Finds a random room in the game and returns it. This method is used when the player attempts to move from a transporter room.
      Returns:
      A randomly selected room from the available rooms in the game.
